summary: Completed comprehensive testing of authentication system for Operational Management Platform. Backend API testing achieved 83.3% success rate (10/12 tests passed). Frontend UI testing achieved 95% success rate with all major authentication flows working correctly.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 Internal Server Error when invalid JWT token is provided
critical_bugs.impact: Poor error handling for malformed tokens
critical_bugs.expected_behavior: Should return 401 Unauthorized with proper error message

validation_issues.issue: Backend accepts passwords shorter than 6 characters
validation_issues.impact: Password validation only enforced on frontend
validation_issues.expected_behavior: Backend should validate minimum password length

passed_tests: Login with invalid credentials (proper error handling)
Login with non-existent email (proper error handling)
Protected route redirect when not authenticated
Navigation between login and register pages
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix JWT token validation error handling in auth_utils.py - invalid tokens should return 401 instead of 500. Consider adding backend password validation for consistency.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (18/19 tests passed - minor navigation issue resolved)
